summary: A pregnant teenage girl must fend for herself when her mother remarries, leaving the girl with only a new male friend for support.
cast: Dora Bryan|Robert Stephens|Rita Tushingham|Murray Melvin|Paul Danquah|Michael Bilton|Eunice Black|Hazel Blears|David Boliver|Margo Cunningham|Shelagh Delaney|A. Goodman|John Harrison|Veronica Howard|Moira Kaye|Linda Lewis|Graham Roberts|Janet Rugg|Valerie Skardon|Herbert Smith|Rosalie Williams|Jack Yarker
keywords: social realism|working class|friendship|coming of age|loss of virginity
title: Un sabor a miel
